info.intro: My name is Alessia and I am a software engineer based out of New York. I care about pretty designs, intuitive interfaces and accessibility.

projects.title: no panic agency
projects.description: no panic is a digital agency based out of Turin, Italy. They specialize in branding, copyrighting, social media, web and app design.
